channel.title: Work on Paul Strickland
channel.description: Recent content in Work on Paul Strickland

item.title: Good Day
item.description: Today was a good day. Perhaps even a very good day. A great day? Maybe that’s going too far, but it was good enough to make me think about why I left the office feeling that I’d accomplished a lot. A little bit about my job I work in an office with a team of eight people. I should actually clarify that by saying that I lead the team, but I don’t like to sound self-important.
